column4: ubuntu 11.10 is ugly, sorry to say.  i wonder what the next installment will look like.  it 'seems' that years ago there was more innovation amongst the various distros, window managers 'seemed' to look nicer than they do now.  now everything seems very similar across the board, it's getting stagnant.

sure it's not, but it's a valid concern, and i dare to say that most of the comments in here are either support questions that never get answered, rude comments or just general opinions such as mine ;)
no, this channel is not for that, chit chat in #ubuntu-offtopic
